Desc.entry: A not-for-profit organisation which teaches traditional Chinese skills for health and relaxation. Wild Goose qigong has a 2000 year history and comprises of gentle movements that stimulate acupuncture points and channels, massaging the internal organs and promoting health. Chun Yuen Quan is a system of kung fu that originated in the Northern Shaolin temple in China. The skill has been influenced by the Chinese Opera and is now practised primarily for health. The skill is dynamic and enjoyable and complements the Wild goose qigong skill.

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - TAI CHI, QI GONG AND CAPOEIRA
